verses.verse: Save <S%H3467><s%> me, <S%H430><s%> God, by your name. <S%H8034><s%> Vindicate <S%H1777><s%> me in your might. <S%H1369><s%>
Hear <S%H8085><s%> my prayer, <S%H8605><s%> God. <S%H430><s%> Listen <S%H238><s%> to the words <S%H561><s%> of my mouth. <S%H6310><s%>

For strangers <S%H2114><s%> have risen up <S%H6965><s%> against me. <S%H6184><s%> Violent men have sought <S%H1245><s%> after my soul. <S%H5315><s%> They haven't <S%H7760><s%> set God <S%H430><s%> before them. <S%H5542><s%> Selah.
Behold, <S%H430><s%> God is my helper. <S%H5826><s%> The Lord <S%H136><s%> is the one <S%H5315><s%> who sustains my soul. <S%H5315><s%>
He will repay <S%H7725><s%> the evil <S%H7451><s%> to my enemies. <S%H8324><s%> Destroy <S%H6789><s%> them in your truth. <S%H571><s%>
With a free will offering, <S%H5071><s%> I will sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> to you. <S%H3034><s%> I will give thanks to your name, <S%H8034><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> for it is good. <S%H2896><s%>
For he has delivered <S%H5337><s%> me out of all trouble. <S%H6869><s%> My eye <S%H5869><s%> has seen <S%H7200><s%> triumph over my enemies. <S%H341><s%>
